hints.content:
![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/e0fc5ade94977adb63074adcec751ea7.png)

We can take apart $\green{8}$ to make $\pink3$ and $\blue5$.  
We can put together $\pink3$ and $\blue5$ to make $\green8$.

question.content:
**Fill in the blanks.**  

 | | |
:-: | :-: | :-:
$8-3=$ [[☃ input-number 1]] | because | [[☃ input-number 2]] $+$ $3=8$
